categories: Category:Enlisted personnel of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: An Imperial controller served aboard the Super Star Destroyer Executor during the Battle of Hoth in 3 ABY. During the battle, the Executor worked in tandem with the bounty hunting vessel Mist Hunter, piloted by the hunters Zuckuss and 4-LOM, to disable the fleeing Rebel Alliance GR-75 medium transport Bright Hope. Afterward, the controller communicated with the bounty hunting duo, directing them to rendezvous with the Executor within the nearby Hoth asteroid field to join the Imperials' preplanned hunt for Rebel fugitive Han Solo.
